Quail By Mail is a ladies working fashion design studio 2 miles away from the Paignton town centre.

The label specialises in quality, artisan and ethical fabrics such as organic and fairtrade cotton, South African shweshwe, Ahimsa peace silk from India and organic tweed from the Ardalanish Isle of Mull Weavers. Quail By Mail manufactures all clothing lines within a 40 mile radius of Paignton, empowering the local cottage industry.

As Paignton is a seaside town, you can expect the usual takeaway establishments mainly Fish & Chip Shops, Chinese & Cantonese & Indian cuisines.

One Restaurant,
has great seaviews of Torbay itself.
is a pub that offers great drinking atmosphere for the older and more mature people and also offers great views on the sea. Easy access as well.

is a typical family pub which is owned by Brewers Fayre. This pub offers a fun house for the kids which should in time keep them quiet but also, the pub is right near the beach and also has an arcade and also a large outdoor water slide, so much for the kids to do. Worth a try!

, for bed and breakfast in Paignton.
A distinctive, late Victorian b&b, The Ratcliffe Guest House is run by Kevin and Anna Hunt.They offer a varied and balanced menu for breakfast using home cooked locally sourced produce.
It is situated in the heart of Paignton, Devon with the beach, town center and local amenities all within a few minutes stroll.
